about.name: Atharva Dudhe
about.title: Full Stack Developer
about.description: Aspiring full-stack developer with hands-on experience in MERN projects. Passionate about building user-friendly applications, solving complex problems, and continuously learning to bring impactful ideas to life through code.

achievements.title: Top 10 Finalist - SIH 2025
achievements.description: Developed an AI-Based Traffic Management System reducing congestion by 30–35% while solving 12 key objectives.

achievements.title: Top 100 - SIH 2024
achievements.description: Created a Smart Plant Watering System using IoT sensors, saving 35–40% water and improving hydration by 25%.

achievements.title: Open Source Contributor - GirlScript Summer of Code
achievements.description: Selected contributor for enhancing open-source projects during GSSoC 2025.

achievements.title: Design Patent Holder
achievements.description: Granted a patent for a Semi-Automated Bio-Processing System improving lab efficiency.

achievements.title: Technical Head - CRiEYA Research & Innovation Center
achievements.description: Led technical initiatives, projects, and mentored peers in innovation-driven activities.

achievements.title: Website Team Member - Cloud Computing Club
achievements.description: Maintained and developed the official club website as part of the technical team.

projects.name: XPlayVerse
projects.description: A MERN stack gaming platform showcasing trending games. Users can create, view, and delete posts, update profiles, and chat in real-time. JWT-based authentication ensures secure access.

projects.name: ContactBook
projects.description: A MERN stack Contact Management app with a minimalist UI, allowing users to add, update, view, and delete contacts. Fully Dockerized for easy deployment.

projects.name: Document Analyzer Api
projects.description: A FastAPI service that extracts text from PDF, HTML, Markdown, and TXT files, providing automated summaries, named entities, and keywords. Easy-to-use endpoints for file upload and text analysis.

projects.name: NoteNest
projects.description: A MERN stack personal note-taking app allowing users to securely sign up, log in, and manage their notes. Features include creating, updating, deleting notes, and a user profile section, with JWT-based authentication for secure access.

projects.name: Employee Management System
projects.description: A Java Spring Boot Employee Management System with REST APIs for creating and retrieving employee records. Demonstrates CRUD operations, entity mapping with Spring Data JPA, and uses H2 in-memory database for quick testing and demos.

projects.name: SIH — InterCollege Team Finder
projects.description: A MERN stack platform that helps students form inclusive inter-college teams for hackathons and projects. Features secure JWT authentication, team constraints like size limit and gender diversity, and a clean UI for managing teams and profiles.
